headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Quanta’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Quanta’s first quarter results were met with a strong positive reaction from the market, underscored by double-digit revenue growth and robust order activity. Management attributed the performance to rising demand for grid modernization and essential infrastructure upgrades, particularly from utilities and data center operators. CEO Duke Austin emphasized the company’s ability to deliver “comprehensive self-perform infrastructure solutions,” noting that Quanta’s integrated approach and skilled l
